batteryName.title: Battery Name
batteryName.description: The name to be used for the battery indicator.

autoRefresh.title: Auto-refresh
autoRefresh.description: Note: This will use your vehicle's battery to refresh data.

refreshRate.title: Refresh rate (in minutes)
refreshRate.description: Note: Faster refresh times will significantly drain your vehicle's battery.

chargingSwitch.title: Charging Switch
chargingSwitch.description: Adds a button that can trigger automations when your electric vehicle begins charging.

plugSwitch.title: Plug Switch
plugSwitch.description: Adds an occupancy sensor that can trigger automations when your electric vehicle is plugged into the charging port.

application_id.title: Application ID
application_id.description: Enter the application ID from the FordPass API app when you requested access.  Usually starts with 1

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Enter the client ID from the FordPass API app when you requested access.  Usually starts with 1

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Enter the client secret from the FordPass API app when you requested access.  Usually starts with RHO

code.title: Code
code.description: Enter the code from the FordPass API app
